#define DECLARE_CLASS (  id   )     enum CLASS_ID { ID = (id) }; static CLASS_ID GetID() { CLASS_ID _id = ID; return _id; }
 

this macro has to be placed inside a class declaration. It defines the class id which is necessary to distinguish the type of the class
